title: League of Randomness... :)
body:
#Ich dachte mir doch bei Shaco wäre was faul! (was sich nun bestätigt xD )

>Q:
**CAST TIME** ~~Randomly between 0.05 seconds and 0.3 seconds~~ ⇒ 0.125 seconds

>W:
**ARM TIME** ~~Randomly between from 2.1 seconds to 2.3 seconds~~ ⇒ 2 seconds

>R:
**INVULNERABILITY** ~~Randomly between 0.25 seconds to 0.5 seconds~~ ⇒ 0.5 seconds

##Was kommt als nächstes ans Licht Riot?

>Nidalee Q:

>**MAX RANGE DAMAGE** ~~Randomly between 10 to 10000~~ ⇒ 500

http://www.surrenderat20.net/2016/11/patch-622-notes.html
